name: Ancient Ruins Demo Scene
description:
Hello everyone this is my first time making an  scene in unreal engine  . so I have made an ancient ruins scene  .

-the assets were taken from unreal market place 

- the player or the manequim was not made by me its the default third person template provided by unreal 

- the scene and its design, lighting   was made by me .

DEMO SCENE VIDEO ABOUT HOW IT LOOKS : 

Note : this is not a game its just a small demo scene which i wanted to share and i have maxed out all the settings for the scene so i dont know whether it runs on other devices mostly it will run . really sorry for not keeping it optimized this is m,y first time in unreal.
